exercise.name: regular push-ups
tips: arms to the side of body, hands on floor 45 degree out from the body, lower your upper torso to the ground and push up.
Your upper torso should be lowered to the floor, your hands should be 45 degrees away from your body, then push yourself up.
Push up after lowering your upper torso to the floor with your hands on the floor 45 degrees away from your body.

exercise.name: jumping jacks
tips: hands by side, feet together, quickly jump and bring hands up while landing in a wide stance, then hands back down and feet together, repeat
Jump swiftly and bring your hands up while landing in a wide stance. Then, bring your hands back down and your feet together.
Jump swiftly and bring your hands up while landing in a wide stance, then jump back to starging postion.

exercise.name: tricep push-ups
tips: keep elbows close to the body. distance between elbows and torso should be minimal, lower your body to floor and then push up from the floor.
Keep your elbows close to your body; the space between your elbows and torso should be as small as possible. Lower your body to the floor, then push yourself up from there.
Keep your elbows close to your body; there should be little space between them and your torso. Lower your body to the floor, and then push yourself up from there.

exercise.name: squats
tips: Feet shoulder width apart, back straight, descend to 90 degree position and then come up.
With your back straight and your feet at shoulder width apart, you should decline to a 90-degree posture before rising.
Keeping your back straight and your feet at shoulder width apart, bend your knees to a 90-degree angle before rising.

exercise.name: bicycle sit-ups
tips: Lie down with knees bent, place hands behind your head, lift your upper body to your knees.
Kneel down and lift your upper body to your knees while keeping your hands behind your head.
Kneel down and raise your upper body to your knees while keeping your hands behind your head.

exercise.name: superman
tips: Lie face down, arms extended in front, raise your arms, legs and chest a few inches off the floor and pause at the top.
Lay face down with your arms out in front of you. Lift your arms, legs, and chest a few inches off the ground, then pause when you reach the top.
Lay face down with your arms out in front of you, elevate your chest, arms, and legs a few inches off the ground.

exercise.name: lungee
tips: place one foot in front and descend your body, push up with the same front foot, alternate front foot and repeat.
placing one foot in front, lowering your body, pushing up with the same front foot, switching feet, and repeating.
Place one foot in front and lower your body. Push up with the same front foot. Alternate front feet. Repeat.

exercise.name: burpee
tips: As you complete a push-up, completely lower your body to the ground, and then spring up straight.
Jump up straight after fully lowering your body to the ground and performing a push-up.
Lower body all the way to the floor, as you perform a push-up, jump up straight up.

exercise.name: knee to elbow plank
tips: Do a plank with your body, keeping forearms on the floor, alternate in bringing your knee towards same-side elbow.
Keep forearms on the floor while performing a plank, and alternately bring your knee to the elbow on the same side.
Plank your torso on the floor. Alternately bring your knee to the elbow on the same side.

exercise.name: tricep dips
tips: face away from the chair or sofa, put your hands on the edge with your fingers facing forward, starting with straight arms. legs straight out and lower your torso.
Start with straight arms, legs out straight in front of you, then lower your torso while keeping your back away from the chair or sofa.
Start with your arms straight, legs straight out in front of you, then lower your torso while keeping your back to the chair or sofa and your fingers facing forward.

exercise.name: high knees
tips: Run in place, bringing knees up to your waist line. Remember that repetitions are listed for each leg, and not both legs.
Bring your knees up to your waist as you run in place.
Raise knees to waist, while running in place. Remember to keep your back straight while performing the exercise.

exercise.name: mountain climbers
tips: Forming a plank, quickly bring your knee to chest, then alternate the leg your bring to your chest
Quickly raise your knee to your chest while holding a plank, then switch which leg you brought to your chest.
Quickly alternate the leg you raise to your chest while holding a plank position.

exercise.name: lower back raises
tips: Lie face down. hands behind your head, then go on and raise your upper torso, keeping your lower torso on the ground.
face down on the ground. Keeping your lower torso on the ground, raise your upper torso.
Lay face down on the ground with your hands behind your head. Then, elevate your upper torso while keeping your lower torso still.

exercise.name: bicep curls
exercise.equipment: dumbbell, resistant band, other weight object
tips: keep elbows to the side of your torso. Take the weight, lift the weight up with your arm, flexing your bicep and keeping your elbow inline with your body.
keep your elbows by your sides. Take the weight and raise it with your arm, flexing your biceps while maintaining a parallel angle between your elbow and body.
maintain your elbows by your side. By flexing your biceps and keeping your elbow parallel to your body, elevate the weight by using your arm to support it.

exercise.name: leg raises
exercise.equipment: dumbbell, resistant band, other weight object
tips: Lie down, back placed on floor. Keep legs straight and upper body still touching the ground, lift your legs up.
Lay flat with your back on the floor. Lift your legs up while keeping your legs straight and your upper body in contact with the ground.
Lie down with your back on the ground. Lift your legs up while maintaining straight legs and a grounded upper body.
